Posts.Content: Hi, So just had my first EC chemo on Thursday and have now run out of my prescribed anti sickness meds. Feeling nauseous all day. Do I just persevere?  Magwhy
Posts.Title: First EC chemo

Posts.Content: Thank you all that replied. I have taken your advice and rang the hospital. End result is that my GP will prescribe some more anti sickness medication.  Also will try the sickness bands too.
Posts.Title: First EC chemo
